description_text:
I was wondering how long before you ship and receive a tracking number?

conversations.body_text: Hi Deejay Calanoc,    Your order has been shipped, and we have sent you a shipping notification. Here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSEHH0715573710YQ
